ygData.subject: Every recipe is in a book, in the game...
ygData.msgSnippet: Folks, Stop your whinning about not having a web site to hold your hand while you tinker. Every recipe in the game can be found in a book either on Bom
ygData.messageBody:
Folks,

Stop your whinning about not having a web site to hold your hand while you tinker. Every recipe in the game can be found in a book either on Bom Knotwood at the wind mills or another gnome in Akanon.

Geez, after all the pain and suffering most of us tinkers have gone thru if you newcomers cant even scrape up a few gold to buy a damn book you dont deserve to be tinkers, and I sure as hell aint gonna help ya ... =|

FizzWizz of tunare
